name: credenciamento-backend
description: Backend para o site de credenciamento da Abrasel

scripts.dev: set ENVIRONMENT=development && nodemon -e "ts,json" --watch "src/**" --exec "node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register --import ./lib/register-ts-node-esm.mjs" src/server.ts
scripts.dev:debug: set ENVIRONMENT=development && nodemon --inspect=127.0.0.1:9229 -e "ts,json" --watch "src/**" --exec "node -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register --import ./lib/register-ts-node-esm.mjs" src/server.ts

author: lucassmcardoso
